    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Removing graffiti on desks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Löschen von von Graffiti auf Schreibtischen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Retirer le graffiti sur des bureaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Removendo o graffiti em mesas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rimozione del graffiti sugli scrittori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφαίρεση των γκράφιτι στα γραφεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Quitar la pintada en los escritorios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that graffiti on desks is effectively removed by using a solvent that dissolves the dye.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Alcohol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solvent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Graffiti auf 
Schreibtischen effektiv durch das Verwenden eines Lösungsmittels 
gelöscht wird, das die Färbung auflöst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le graffiti sur des 
bureaux est pertinemment retiré en utilisant un dissolvant qui 
dissout le colorant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o graffiti em mesas 
está removido eficazmente usando um solvente que dissolva a tintura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il graffiti sugli 
scrittori è rimosso efficacemente usando un solvente che dissolve la 
tintura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το γκράφιτι στα 
γραφεία αφαιρείται αποτελεσματικά με τη χρησιμοποίηση ενός 
διαλύτη που διαλύει τη χρωστική ουσία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la pintada en los 
escritorios es quitada con eficacia usando un solvente que disuelva el
tinte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
